This transferred post maintains the same event (moving away from family) but replaces the stable attributional style with an unstable one. Instead of attribute the cause of feeling lost and alone to a permanent trait, the post suggests that it's a temporary and transient experience that can be overcome with time. The individual is also given agency in finding their way back home, which reinforces a more positive attribution style.
